snippet: Beyond the tipping questions that surface every Christmas, the year-round etiquette of dealing with a doorman is complex, unwritten and, for some, intimidating.
abstract: Getting Started column on year-round etiquette of dealing with a doorman; complex, unwritten process can be a source of anxiety for tenants arriving in New York City.
lead_paragraph: Beyond the tipping questions that surface every Christmas, the year-round etiquette of dealing with a doorman is complex, unwritten and, for some, intimidating.

headline.print_headline: Let Me Get That for You
headline.seo: Getting Started – The Care and Handling of the Doorman
headline.main: Let Me Get That for You
